distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for MozillaFirefox fixes the following issues:

- Mozilla Firefox 68.6.1esr
  MFSA 2020-11 (bsc#1168630)
  * CVE-2020-6819 (bmo#1620818)
    Use-after-free while running the nsDocShell destructor
  * CVE-2020-6820 (bmo#1626728)
    Use-after-free when handling a ReadableStream
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Under certain conditions, when running the nsDocShell destructor, a race condition can cause a use-after-free. We are aware of targeted attacks in the wild abusing this flaw. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 68.7.0, Firefox < 74.0.1, and Firefox ESR < 68.6.1.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: Under certain conditions, when handling a ReadableStream, a race condition can cause a use-after-free. We are aware of targeted attacks in the wild abusing this flaw. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 68.7.0, Firefox < 74.0.1, and Firefox ESR < 68.6.1.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
